name: object_detection
template: urisourcebin uri="{source[uri]}" ! queue ! decodebin ! videoconvert name="videoconvert" ! video/x-raw ! videocrop name="videocrop" ! queue leaky=upstream ! gvadetect device=CPU model-instance-id=inf0 model="{models[object_detection][1][network]}" model-proc="{models[object_detection][1][proc]}" name="detection" ! gvametaconvert name="metaconvert" add-empty-results=true ! queue ! gvametapublish name="destination" ! gvawatermark ! queue ! videoconvert ! fpsdisplaysink video-sink=fakesink sync=false
